s.label: Interferometer settings
s.desc: These settings are used only when running the interferometer simulation.

s.label: Channel bandwidth [Hz]
s.desc: The channel width, in Hz, used to simulate bandwidth smearing. (Note that this can be different to the frequency increment if channels do not cover a contiguous frequency range.)

s.label: Time average [sec]
s.desc: The correlator time-average duration, in seconds, used to simulate time averaging smearing.

s.label: UV range filter min
s.desc: The minimum value of the baseline UV length allowed by the filter. Note that visibilities on baseline UV lengths outside this range will not be evaluated!

s.label: UV range filter max
s.desc: The maximum value of the baseline UV length allowed by the filter. Note that visibilities on baseline UV lengths outside this range will not be evaluated!

s.label: UV range filter units
s.desc: The units of the baseline UV length filter values.

s.label: Output OSKAR visibility file
s.desc: Path of the OSKAR visibility output file containing the results of the simulation. Leave blank if not required.

s.label: Output Measurement Set
s.desc: Path of the Measurement Set containing the results of the simulation. Leave blank if not required.
